titleStmt.title: Articles of peace & commerce between the most serene and mighty prince Charles II. by the grace of God, King of Great Britain, France and Ireland, defender of the faith, &c. and the most illustrious lords, the Bashaw, Dey, Aga, and governours of the famous city and kingdom of Algiers in Barbary Concluded by Arthur Herbert, Esquire, Admiral of His Majesties fleet in the Mediterranean Seas: on the tenth day of April, Old Stile, 1682. Published by His Majesties command.
Treaties, etc. Algeria, 1682 Apr. 20
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.
